metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on Sherlock Holmes with intricate mysteries and compelling drama, similar to 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Dystopian sci-fi anthology series with dark humor and thought-provoking themes, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: A philosophical comedy with quirky characters and unexpected twists, blending humor like 'Scrubs' with deeper themes found in 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: A hilarious workplace comedy with a strong ensemble cast, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' but with a focus on law enforcement.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A mind-bending German sci-fi mystery with complex characters and a gripping plot, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Orphan Black
metas.description: A thrilling sci-fi series with a compelling mystery and strong female lead, similar to 'Stranger Things' but with a focus on cloning.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: A British sitcom with quirky characters and witty humor, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'Goodness Gracious Me'.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky and mind-bending sci-fi mystery series with a unique sense of humor, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: BoJack Horseman
metas.description: An animated comedy with dark humor and surprisingly emotional depth, similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: An animated space opera with humor and heartfelt moments, reminiscent of 'Futurama' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Visually stunning animated series with a compelling story and complex characters, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' but with a deeper narrative.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A sci-fi comedy about the afterlife in a digital world, blending humor like 'Scrubs' with sci-fi elements from 'Futurama'.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A mockumentary comedy about vampire roommates, similar to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' but with a supernatural twist.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: A dark comedy-drama about grief and finding meaning in life, similar to 'Ted Lasso' but with a more cynical tone.

metas.name: Umbrella Academy
metas.description: A superhero series with dysfunctional characters and a compelling mystery, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A dark and satirical superhero series with graphic violence and cynical humor, a deconstruction of the genre, fitting with 'Fallout' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi drama with quirky characters and surreal visuals, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: A dark comedy about a woman stuck in a time loop, with witty dialogue and emotional depth, blending humor with sci-fi elements.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller about parallel universes and espionage, with a complex plot and strong performances, fitting with 'Foundation' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: A sci-fi series about time travelers on a mission to save humanity, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: A British sitcom with a unique perspective and awkward humor, similar to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: A British sitcom with surreal humor and pop culture references, similar to 'The Simpsons' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: A sitcom with meta-humor and quirky characters, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'The Simpsons'.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: A cult classic sitcom with a dysfunctional family and witty writing, similar to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: A feel-good comedy with lovable characters and optimistic themes, similar to 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: A dark comedy-drama with witty writing and emotional depth, similar to 'After Life' and 'Ted Lasso', but with British sensibilities.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: A psychological thriller with a complex protagonist and a gripping plot, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Hannibal
metas.description: A psychological horror-thriller with stunning visuals and compelling characters, appealing to fans of mystery and drama.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: A crime drama about the early days of criminal profiling, with a focus on psychology and suspense, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: A British police procedural with twists and turns, and complex characters, similar to 'The Night Manager' and the user's watched crime dramas.

metas.name: Broadchurch
metas.description: A British crime drama with a compelling mystery and strong performances, appealing to fans of 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: A dark and intense crime drama with a brilliant but troubled detective, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: A historical drama with a compelling protagonist and a focus on strategy and skill, though not in the same genres, it may appeal.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A sci-fi drama with a complex plot and realistic portrayal of space travel, similar to 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Killjoys
metas.description: A fun sci-fi adventure series with a group of bounty hunters in space, reminiscent of 'Fallout' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Stargate SG-1
metas.description: A classic sci-fi series with adventure and humor, similar to 'Doctor Who' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: An anthology crime series with dark humor and quirky characters, similar to 'Brassic' and the user's watched crime dramas.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: A comedy-drama with surreal elements and insightful social commentary, appealing to fans of shows that blend genres.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: A comedy-drama about a woman reliving the same day, with dark humor and existential themes.  Appeals to fans of unique premises like 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Banshee
metas.description: Action-packed crime drama with a complex anti-hero. Appeals to fans of intense dramas like the mystery ones watched.
